description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Includes both popular Hold'em games. Hold 'em is a community card poker game. Omaha is similar to Texas, except each player is dealt four cards and must make their best hand using exactly two of them, plus exactly three of the five community cards. Play offline against the computer players or with up to seven other players on Xbox LIVE. Features online World-wide Rankings and 20 in-game awards.
description.short: Includes both popular Hold'em games. Hold 'em is a community card poker game. Omaha is similar to Texas, except each player is dealt four cards and must make their best hand using exactly two of them, plus exactly three of the five community cards. Play offline against the computer players or with up to seven other players on Xbox LIVE. Features online World-wide Rankings and 20 in-game awards.
